sheep.game
Class Sprite

java.lang.Object
  sheep.game.Sprite

public class Sprite
extends java.lang.Object

The Sprite represents superclass of the "models" of the game objects. It contains position, speed, scale and other common properties. It can optionally contain a Shape and be used in the collision detection system. The Sprite has no graphical representation, it contains only a reference to a SpriteView objects, which knows how to draw the Sprite based on its current transformation. Having a SpriteView is also optional; it is possible to have invisible Sprites which act as "sensors" in the collision detection system. Sprite objects may also generate collision events, and classes implementing CollisionListener may listen to these events.

Constructor Detail

Sprite

public Sprite()
Creates a new Sprite with no Shape and no SpriteView.

Sprite

public Sprite(Image image)
Creates a Sprite from the given Image. The Shape is automatically generated from the Image dimensions, and the offset is automatically set to the center of the image.

Parameters:
image - The Image to represent the Sprite visually.

Sprite

public Sprite(SpriteView view)
Creates a new Sprite with the specified SpriteView. No Shape is created for the Sprite, the and the offset remains (0, 0).

Parameters:
view - The SpriteView for this Sprite.
Method Detail

update

public void update(float dt)
Moves the Sprite, updates the transformation matrix and updates view and shape.

Parameters:
dt - The time step since last frame (seconds).

draw

public void draw(android.graphics.Canvas canvas)
Draws this Sprite on the Canvas.

Parameters:
canvas - The Canvas to draw the Sprite onto.

setParent

public void setParent(SpriteContainer parent)
Sets the parent SpriteContainer. If the Sprite knows its parent container, it can remove itself from it.

Parameters:
parent - The SpriteContainer holding the Sprite.

setShape

public void setShape(Shape shape)
Sets a new Shape used for collision detection.

Parameters:
shape - The new Shape for this Sprite.

setShape

public void setShape(float width,
                     float height)
Sets a new rectangular Shape for this Sprite.

Parameters:
width - The width of the rectangle.
height - The height of the rectangle.

setGroup

public void setGroup(long group)
Sets the group bits for this Sprite. Each set bit (1) indicates membership of the corresponding group. For instance, to make a Sprite a member of group 1 and 3 (but no others) set the group bits to 0x10, which in binary is 0101.

Parameters:
group - The group bits.

getGroup

public long getGroup()
Gets the group bits for this Sprite. See setGroup.

Returns:

addGroup

public void addGroup(int n)
Adds a group to the Sprite. In order to add a Sprite to group 5, just call addGroup(5).

Parameters:
n - The group number (0-63).

setMask

public void setMask(long mask)
Sets the group mask for this Sprite. Each set bit in this mask indicates that the Sprite should NOT collide with other members of that group. For instance, to keep this Sprite from colliding with members of group 3 and 4, call setMask(0x24), which in binary is 00011.

Parameters:
mask - The collision mask bits for this Sprite.

addMask

public void addMask(int n)
Sets a collision mask bit. For instance, to keep this Sprite from colliding with groups 3 and 4, just call addMask(3) and addMask(4).

Parameters:
n - The group number to keep this Sprite from colliding with.

getMask

public long getMask()
Gets the mask bits for this Sprite.

Returns:
The mask bits for this Sprite.

die

public void die()
Removes this Sprite from its parent continer. If no parent is set, calling this function has no effect.

Sets a new SpriteView for this Sprite.

Parameters:
view - The new SpriteView for this Sprite.

The current SpriteView for this Sprite.

collides

public boolean collides(Sprite sprite)
Checks for collision between this and another Sprite. If at least one of the Sprites have no shape, calling this has no effect.

Parameters:
sprite - The other Sprite.
Returns:
True if the two Sprites collide, false otherwise.

Parameters:
